name: Pilgrim Game
description:
This game was created as a test of skills we had been developing. It's only short and I haven't tested it on other systems. The goal is to rescue your fellow crewmates from cages around the islands.

The theme was: Mayflower 400

Music used is 'The Pyre' by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4504-the-pyre

License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
